attributes.action: Give Knighthoods to ALL European Cup Winning Managers, Posthumous or not
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel it is a travesy that the only Football managers to be honoured with Knighthoods for winning the European Cup have been the 2 Manchester United Managers, Alex Ferguson and Matt Busby.
Why, regardless of their status of being dead or alive, have these honours not been bestowed upon Jock Stein, Bob Paisley, Brian Clough, and Tony Barton, along with an honourary knighthood for Rafael Benitez?
The Knighthood was bestowed right away upon Alex Ferguson, why was this same honour not done at all with any of the others.
As an Everton Fan, I have no affiliation to any club, but feel this is something that can be rectified.
Please take this into consideration and provide all football managers who have brought European Football's greatest club honour home to Britain, the same honour that seems to be reserved for Manchester United

With kind regards

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
